properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
